property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: A cup of tea in Pakistan

note.text: Drinking tea is an important part of Pakistani culture. If a counterpart offers you tea or a soft drink during a meeting, you should accept their offer as a sign of respect to your host.
If you do not drink tea for religious or health-related reasons, you can politely decline. However, be sure to explain to your hosts why you are declining so that they are not offended.
